entry.title: [CW] On the topic of spooky culture war items, someone [blew up](https://news.yahoo.c
entry.content:
On the topic of spooky culture war items, someone [blew up](https://news.yahoo.com/georgia-guidestones-explosion-live-large-171102114.html) one of the stone pillars that make up the Georgia Guidestones.
For those not familiar the [Georgia Guidestones](https://creepycatalog.com/georgia-guidestones-a-complete-guide/) are a monument created by a secretive person or group that list a set of guidelines for some post apocalyptic society. One of the most famous guidelines is to maintain the human population at 500 million.
They've been pretty popular in conspiracy circles since their mysterious creation.
